scripts.test:local: yarn install && cross-env TEST_E2E_URL_GATEWAY='http://localhost:5000' TEST_E2E_URL_WEB='http://localhost:3455' TEST_E2E_API_URI=http://localhost:8080 TEST_JUDGE_USERNAME='judge@example.com' TEST_JUDGE_PASSWORD='Pa55word11' TEST_DWP_USERNAME='dwpuser@example.com' TEST_DWP_PASSWORD='Pa55word11' TEST_CASEOFFICER_USERNAME='local.test@example.com' TEST_CASEOFFICER_PASSWORD='Pa55word11' protractor ./e2e/features.parallel.conf.js --cucumberOpts.tags=@nightly-test
